3: What exactly is a search engine evaluation job? Search engine evaluation is the process of making informed decisions about websites, webpages, music videos, songs, images, maps and other data and rating them for accuracy, completeness and other factors. No experience necessary, all you need is: A smart phone and a personal computer You will be asked to download an app on your smartphone to complete work Commitment of at least 10hrs per week (set on your schedule) What to expect when you register: Create an Appen Account Complete your profile and project registration [5 min] Study the provided guidelines [at your own pace] Pass a 3-part exam [1-2 hrs]
